channel.title: Web Technologies on Sad Robot
channel.description: Recent content in Web Technologies on Sad Robot

item.title: OAuth 2.0
item.description: #Open Authorization 2.0 (OAuth 2.0) What problem does OAuth 2.0 solve? With the appearance of consumer devices in Smartphones, then tablets, hybrid devices and IoT, auth that could cover the new connectedness of things was needed. Enterprise SAML and SOAP, Kerberos, LDAP, AD etc only really worked on Intranets.

item.title: OpenID Connect
item.description: #OpenID Connect OpenID Connect adds identity and authentication to the OAuth 2.0 protocol
